entries.abort: Forget it, pal! I'm not doing this for my health!
entries.arrived_at_loc: The Ghrag contact has your location. He will be here in seconds...
entries.complete: Good work! The Ghrag contact is on his way to the monastery... and we got the info we needed!
entries.escort_too_far3: Look! You escorting me or not?!
entries.failed_destroy: Looks like the Ghrag contact's ship has been disintegrated. Hopefully it was just a decoy...
entries.failed_protect: I think the Ghrag contact went back to their base... since you didn't stay close enough!
entries.found_loc: Head into the Tyyyn nebula and rendezvous with the Ghrag contact.
entries.goodbye_4: It's off to the pleasant sands of Tatooine!
entries.hull_half: The ship is about to blow up! Help!
entries.panic_2: What are you doing? Help me!
entries.panic_4: Don't let them blow me up, pal!
entries.quest_escort_d: Make sure that any Ghrag fighters that intercept you are destroyed before they can send word to their commander.
entries.quest_escort_t: Escort the Ghrag mercenary out of the system
entries.quest_location_d: The Ghrag mercenary will be using the Tyyyn nebula to mask his tracking system and give you a head-start on any interceptors.
entries.quest_rendezvous_d: The mercenary starship will meet you at this location so that you may provide escort.
entries.reason_1: Get me out of here safe and you'll get the information you want!
entries.reason_2: Get me out of here safe and you'll get the information you want!
entries.reason_3: Get me out of here safe and you'll get the information you want!
entries.reason_4: Get me out of here safe and you'll get the information you want!
entries.reason_5: Get me out of here safe and you'll get the information you want!
entries.taunt_3: Out of the way! This traitor is mine!
entries.title: Escort a Ghrag Traitor in exchange for information.
entries.title_d: Eyma has made contact with a high-ranking Ghrag mercenary who wants to leave the organization and join an order of monks on Tatooine. In exchange for safe passage, this soon-to-be-ex-mercenary will provide Eyma with tactical information that could save hundreds of lives.
